org.gearvrf.scene_objects

Interface GVRVideoSceneObjectPlayer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public interface GVRVideoSceneObjectPlayer<T>
    Use to supply different media player objects to GVRVideoSceneObject. For example in addition to the default MediaPlayer this can be used to make GVRVideoSceneObject utilize the ExoPlayer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canReleaseSurfaceImmediately()
      Called by GVRVideoSceneObject to determine whether the Surface it creates internally can be released immediately after being passed to the media player.
      T getPlayer()
      Returns the actual player instance
      void pause()
      Pause playback
      void release()
      Called by GVRVideoSceneObject when it is done with the media player; the media player and associated resources can be released.
      void setSurface(Surface surface)
      Called by GVRVideoSceneObject when it has the surface that can be passed to the media player
      void start()
      Start playback

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        T getPlayer()
        Returns the actual player instance

      • setSurface

        void setSurface(Surface surface)
        Called by GVRVideoSceneObject when it has the surface that can be passed to the media player
        Parameters:
        surface -

      • release

        void release()
        Called by GVRVideoSceneObject when it is done with the media player; the media player and associated resources can be released.

      • canReleaseSurfaceImmediately

        boolean canReleaseSurfaceImmediately()
        Called by GVRVideoSceneObject to determine whether the Surface it creates internally can be released immediately after being passed to the media player. If this returns false it means that the implementation is responsible for releasing the Surface.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause playback

      • start

        void start()
        Start playback
